questions.line: Hey babe! <3
answers: New phone, who dis?
Hi sweetie, how are you?
Oh god, please not now.

questions.line: Heya. More asteroids today?
answers: Yes, and if you don't stop texting I'll fly into one on purpose.
Damn, I thought I wouldn't get any signal out here.
'Fraid so. You okay? <3

questions.line: So, you remember my ex? Kept trying to call me earlier.
answers: Sounds like Stockholm Syndrome to me.
Ignore 'em, {PARTNER_ENDEARMENT}! You're in a better place now!
Why didn't you answer? Could've talked someone else's ear off than mine.

questions.line: Be honest. Do you think I've gained weight?
answers: No.
Yes.
OH GOD I'M SURROUNDED BY ASTEROIDS! Ask me again later.

questions.line: Hey, you know what I was thinking?
answers: I never do.
Wait, do we have telepathy and you never told me!? :P

questions.line: We should spend more time together.
answers: It's not you, it's me.
Like- together, together?
GalaxyFlix and chill?

questions.line: Can you believe they DELAYED the release for Stellar Conflict Episode 28??? AGAIN!?
answers: I know, right!?
I can't believe you're still watching that crap.
Oh darn, you can't talk my ear off about it yet. How will I cope.
Less than 3 what??
Please, for the love of god, get a hobby.

questions.line: What are you doing right now? :)
answers: Googling 'how to dispose of a body'.
Nothing.
Making my way back home to you. <3

questions.line: We should get a cat!
answers: Right, because the the plutonian cave crab just wasn't enough.
ARE YOU SERIOUS!?
That is a great idea!

questions.line: If you got a flat tire in space.. how would you fill it back up?
answers: There are literally, quite literally, NO CARS IN SPACE!
That is a really good question.
Let you talk into it for five minutes? Plenty of hot air there.

questions.line: I can't find the nail clippers.
answers: Oh, maybe you should put things back when you're done using them!
I stole them. Nyeh.
Bathroom, left of the sink, third drawer down.

questions.line: By the way... my cat died yesterday. ;_;
answers: Oh no! :(
Good, that bastard kept clawing at me.
That was your cat? Looked like a fat tribble to me.

questions.line: I was thinking of joining a game jam. I've been practising a bit with Godot.
answers: Ah, nice one!
What, that FOSS crap? Stick to Unity.
Come on, only hopeless nerds do stuff like that.

questions.line: Holy crap! The longest wedding veil ever was 63 and a half football fields!!
answers: I think that's 63 and a half, too many.
Can you imagine? xD
I don't care.

questions.line: {PLAYER_ENDEARMENT}, one of the drawers in the bathroom is broken.
answers: I'll fix it when I get home.
And you're telling me, why?
Well hey, don't stop at 1!!

questions.line: Don't forget, it's my sister's birthday this weekend!
answers: And, why do we celebrate that?
Can't wait!
Oh goody.

questions.line: Are you paying attention? I feel like you're ignoring me.
answers: Oh, I'm sorry, I'm a bit busy FLYING A SPACESHIP RIGHT NOW.
Trying my best to.
Of course! I would never ignore you.

questions.line: {PLAYER_ENDEARMENT}, my shoulders are numb from CARRYING THIS CONVERSATION. Are you even there???
answers: Jesus, {PARTNER_ENDEARMENT}, I'm flying through asteroids! Can't this wait?
I'm here!
You could use the exercise, noodlearms.

questions.line: Busy??
answers: I'm never too busy for you. <3
Yes.
How are you not fired yet?

questions.line: Okay, then - I told you earlier that someone close to me died. Who was it?
answers: Your cat, of course.
Your dog, of course.
My hopes for a stable relationship?

questions.line: You barely even noticed when I told you about the game engine I was using!
answers: It was Godot, right?
It was Unity, right?
You switch them like every week! Just pick one and stick with it!

questions.line: Ok then, how long was the wedding veil?
answers: I already know, but I wanna make sure YOU know. So how long was it?
Less then 63.6 football fields long.
What wedding veil??

questions.line: Seriously {PLAYER_ENDEARMENT}, that drawer is so annoying.
answers: Yea I know right? I can never find a fork.
What drawer?
You both should call a truce for now, lol.

questions.line: So, what should we buy for the party this weekend?
answers: Party stuff of course!
We can't go to a party this weekend! We have that.. Other thing?
I think you should decide, you know her best!

questions.line: Okay, I guess you were paying attention. <3
answers: Nah, I just scrolled up. You do know how phones work, right?
Oh goody, I'm not single yet, then.

questions.line: See, this is why I love you.
answers: Woaa. So we're using the L word?
#IAmTheBest
I love you too. :)

questions.line: No way, you remembered!
answers: I was right!? YES!
{PARTNER_ENDEARMENT}, I value each and every thing you say to me.
I mean, my odds were 1 out of 3.

questions.line: You've got a good memory, at least.
answers: And remarkably poor judgement, given my choice of {PARTNER_TYPE}.
Oh, you're one to talk, {PARTNER_TITLE} Anniversary Gift.
One of my many redeeming qualities. ;)
